mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(SEQ, ID, NAME, EMAIL, SUBJECT, CONTENT, REF, LOGTIME) VALUES(SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE)
